input_text:
Job Title: Key Accounts Manager, Salons

Location: Chicago, IL

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Business Development, Sales

Description:
About Us

Dyson is a global technology enterprise. We’re growing fast and our ambition is huge – more categories, more locations and more people. Dyson launched in the US in 2002, and since then operations have grown exponentially. Our US headquarters is based in Chicago's Fulton Market neighborhood. We also have employees working in field sales, our service centers, and in our growing number of Dyson Demo Stores across the country.

We're committed to our campus culture and want to have people collaborating, developing, and learning from each other. By having everyone on campus together, we have been able to nurture a fantastic social and dynamic environment.

About The Role

The US Key Account Manager (hereafter KAM) will focus on unlocking new business for Dyson beauty products at the most prestigious salons across the United States. The KAM will be the subject matter expert for the full range of Dyson Beauty products training and educating Salon Owners, Stylists, Dedicated to the Trade Store Managers and Personnel and the Field Sales teams of Premium Beauty Distributors.

Main Accountabilities And Supporting Activities

Execute salon growth strategy as directed by the General Manager (hereafter GM). This KAM will target the Top 200 Salons and Top 10 Beauty Education institutions in the United States. This KAM will manage the Beauty Distributors to unlock and fully penetrate the targeted salons across the country.Build annual plans working with GM to achieve volume, revenue, and gross margin targets.Build new salon accounts through direct transactions and sales through distributor. Manage portfolio of new accounts when setup. Schedule meetings to demonstrate Dyson beauty products to targeted salon owners and stylist.Train store managers and personnel on how to effectively demonstrate and merchandise Dyson beauty products for maximum revenue generation.Connect with Beauty Distributor regional managers to present Dyson Beauty Products at Master Class events hosted by distributor partner.At store level build relationships with key decision makers and influencers such Salon Owners, Stylists and Store managers.Develop an in-depth understanding of customer needs and requirements to develop a customized value proposition and story. Adhere to pricing and discount policy set by GM and Senior Channel and Operations Manager. Be the primary point of contact for distributor partners and connect decisions makers with GM, Marketing Manager and Senior Channel and Operations Manager.Proactively execute outbound activity to build pipeline of opportunities and meetings with target market. Upload new accounts, opportunities, and sample unit requests into Salesforce.com, to store customer data and keep track of work plan. Keep Salesforce.com updated with all customer activity. Occasionally attend national trade shows as directed by GM and Marketing Team. Be prepared to organize show attendance and ensure materials are onsite. Follow up with potential customers in timely manner. Attend LT meetings monthly or upon request by the GM to provide updates on target customers, account progression and challenges. Review monthly sales out data furnished by the Finance Team to validate sales from accounts and identify potential new target end customers. Achieve Sales Performance Goals and KPI’s established by the GM.Ensure that monthly and annual goals are met across volume and net revenue, as established by the GM. 


SUPPORTING ACTIVITIES

Become a subject matter expert in the full range of Dyson Beauty products and technology.Deliver Beauty training to the Store Managers, Store Personal, Distributor Field Sales team ensuring they can demo and deliver a first-class presentation of Dyson Beauty products.Work individually or in Partnership with Distributor Field Sales Team to train stylists.At the launch of new products be prepared to visit top salons to administer onsite training of staff.Liaise with Marketing to produce materials used in conjunction with education sessions and ways of selling to drive advocacy.Support Regional Sales Managers in education of soft selling skills, styling skills and core product information, while supporting the development and knowledge of Dyson Beauty products.Interact regularly with Consumer National Beauty trainers to ensure best practices, education and training techniques are current.Create a sales approach for stylists in store to take customers from a demonstration through to a sale.Coordinate launches, ensuring tools are provided for the Distributor Field Team, being the subject matter expert in all new beauty products.


Other Areas of Focus

Fulfil other duties, as necessary. Relish the opportunities to pick up new activities that fall broadly in the purpose of the role. Identify problems and find solutions. Consider new ways of working and how to approach National Account customers. Leverage success with marketing to maximize opportunities. Develop an interface with the service team to streamline issue resolution.


About You:

College degree or equivalent Strong selling skills and training backgroundExperience demonstrating and selling beauty products to salon owners, stylist, and beauty distributors personal.Experience working with beauty distributors.Experience in analyzing data and identifying trends.Previous experience creating training materials and educational plans.Seasoned beauty sales professional. Ability to travel nationally a minimum 30% up to a maximum of 50%.Strong presentation and training skills. Desire to collaborate with Beauty Distributor Store Personal and Distributor Field Sales team. Ability to manage distributor partner relationships according to policy.Good record keeping on account progression. Experience working with CRM (Salesforce a plus). Ability to lift, pull, and push up to 30 lbs. Strong Educator and TrainerCollaborator that leads by exampleAdaptable and flexible able to multi-taskApproachableOrganizedExcellent CommunicatorDrive and Motivation 


Benefits: 

At Dyson, how we reward you is linked to our high-performance culture. But it’s about more than salary and bonus. Through a package of financial, lifestyle and health benefits, we support whatever stage of life you’re in and the moments that matter.

Financial Benefits

401K with up to a 4% matchCompany paid Life Insurance and AD&DFlexible Savings Account (FSA) and Health Savings Account (HSA)


Lifestyle Benefits

Competitive Paid Time Off Benefits including Separate Holiday, Sick, and Vacation TimePre-tax Commuter Benefits (applicable areas only)Generous Child Care Leave ProgramWellness ProgramEmployee Assistance ProgramGenerous Dyson Product Discounts


Health Benefits

Multi-Level Healthcare Coverage OptionsVision & Dental CoverageCompany paid Short-Term and Long-Term Disability


Dyson is an equal opportunity employer. We know that great minds don’t think alike, and it takes all kinds of minds to make our technology so unique. We welcome applications from all backgrounds and employment decisions are made without regard to race, colour, religion, national or ethnic origin, sex, sexual orientation, gender identity or expression, age, disability, protected veteran status or other any other dimension of diversity.

Experience Level (if available): Mid-Senior level
